text.div:
Tuberculosis (Tests for Mycobacterium species by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    20892-6 Mycobacterium avium ss paratuberculosis [Presence] in Tissue by Organism specific culture
